showerReviews.reviewText: What a DUMP. Nasty bathroom cant even imagine what the shower looks like. Soda machine no coffee machine    along with a think layer of dust on everything. After being told it was $20 to park over night I left.

It's a really a old Truck Stop.  Very nice and friendly staff.  But the Bathroom and the shower are in my TOP 3 of DIGUSTING ! ! !  In my 17 years Carrer.

Not only Dirty and smelly but clearly not taking care of.
Nasty place.  They charge 15$ to park here! No hot food, no shower,  no coffee.  Do not stop here
The AC was not working. Shower was dirty. Old dirty run down truck stop. Free parking though.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is the worst loves when it comes to showers. The showers are extremely small, I had a corner shower that had no bench in it to sit down on. So I asked the guy was there any showers that had a bench in it because I need one to sit down ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ you have your own cleaning supplies‚Ä¶..All I can say is NASTYY. Started out at the pilot and it had 14 guest in line for a shower. So we looked up loves and notice all of their showers were available. So we decided to drive over there. ‚Ä¶

Year later I'm back still same. Did full exp. Shower, fuel, laundry and food.  Shower ok,  laundry area filthy. Food area look dirty floors havent been mopped or sweep in years. Tiny store, no parking, no easy access to pumps. Dirty store. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ this is my second bad experience stopping at this loves. On February 5,2025 my partner and I booked a shower on the app like we always do and got shower #4 with the code to go in. After entering they came and knock on the door and we ‚Ä¶
Second time I use this location and both time it wasn‚Äôt clean there was hair and finger nails on the floor a dirty towel was left in the shower it does not reflect loves quality I‚Äôm use to

Can't give 0 stars!  No hot water in any shower but they were still selling showers! Shower was not cleaned, hair clippings in sink, wade of hair in shower, floor still had standing water across most of it. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The reviews are all saying  same thing about this location employees. Tonight the store manager refused to let a service animal into the store while driver takes a shower. Told the driver to go get the paperwork that shows the dog was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ flat out lied. Wish I could give them no stars, this is the first Loves I have been to in the country That I do not want to go back. Going to take a shower. If it is as bad as the rest of the store I will be calling the district manager.

Stopped to take a shower. Soon as I walked into the shower room, I immediately noticed it hadn't been cleaned. The dead giveaway was the balled up wet wash cloth sitting on top of a new towel. I informed the manager and she informed me that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ !! Other than that Love's should be ashamed!! Broken women's bathroom. Then opening up shower rooms for the public bathroom use. And all they did before sending me in after was throw some towels in! Dirty shower curtains! We frequent ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Always having water issues I drive for 11 hrs thinking about a shower just to get here and be told sorry no  running water today as a trucker I value the opportunity to shower especially since we are limited on time this is very ‚Ä¶

Easy parking, pretty clean lot for a truckers lot. Showers inside were clean, hot, and both reserved parking and showers were EXTREMELY easy though the TA app. Was even able to unlock my shower door with pushing a button on my app!! I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ additional $25. They take advantage back in the day. Used to be free parking but they take advantage. This place sucks I stopped here to take a shower and have something to eat. My food cost $25. I was here for 2 hours and 1 minute and I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ can of WD-40 for $18.... you can literally get the same can for $8.... ten dollar markup üòÇü§£üòÇ.....to add to that $18 for a shower......that in my opinion should be free if you possess a CDL-A...... this will most likely be my last stop here. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ $30 if you want to park here if they only have reserve spots available. If you get here after 4pm, the only have reserved spots available so be prepared to get kicked out of pay $50. Nice restrooms and shower just a parking pay trap.
Been trucking 12 years and never came here because of the reviews. Poor parking Poor truck shop Poor food Poor shower. Why would anyone actually support this place.

Truck driver you will have to pay$30 for parking and shower before you get there because it is dirty and it smells very bad in the basement area where the showers are located. $18 for shower if you do not have points food is minimum and ‚Ä¶

I would give it 1 star, but they have an amazing staff that care about customer service.  For the awesome customer service from Stan the cashier,  the porter in the shower, and the staff at Country Pride. They are all awesome. ‚Ä¶
$28 to park your truck.  This shit is crazy.  I just need to park to take a shower and I was leaving but they are slapping people across the head at $28
They make you wear a mask because of the virus. Then I would expect to have a clean shower that was disinfected. Especially after paying $15 for a shower and $25 to park

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ me pick out some great smelling oil perfume/cologne made local, good food with fast service, $25 parking/24hr, shower is $20 unisex camp/locker-room style with stalls sink on outside the toilets are separate room. Laundry $2 quarters ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ And the guy said I have to pay $10 for the shower and $15 for the parking I can get a free shower if I feel up for 100 gallons**** ‚Ä¶
Too Expensive. Everything inside is mess. Shower price is 20$, parking 25$, food with one mill 26$. Shower is terrible mess and you should avoid this place ever. ‚Ä¶

DO NOT COME TO THIS ESTABLISHMENT!  READ THE REVIEWS. THEY ARE ACCURATE.

Stopped in here for a shower the man wanted $20. (Not worth more than $5) the shower room has no locking door so it is not private and it is very dirty.

What a filthy place.  I'm surprised that this place hasn't been shut down.  In addition,  $25 to park and $15 for a shower? It was late at night and there was hardly any parking around the area.  I won't be back.  I will park on a ramp or ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 15 dollars to take a shower here is a joke. They should pay 50 for people to shower here. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . 06-02-2022, I'm a truck driver who had a late delivery on that night. I called before I came ask was it ok if I take a shower and use the bathroom. The african guy who was working the desk was already rude when I called as if he was ‚Ä¶
Only reason I'm giving two stars is the fuel price!!   Showers are nasty!  They charge $12 for over night parking EVEN WHEN YOU BUY FUEL!! ‚Ä¶

WT* did I just pay $10 for? Took a shower in the ladies shower. I don't mind it being old and run down, but why can't they clean it? The place obviously had not been cleaned in a looooong time. Unswept floors, nasty walls, hairs stuck ‚Ä¶

Do not shower here. Found crack pipe In bathroom. Washed hands and dried hands off with towel then threw it in hamper. That towel cost me 10 bucks because I wanted a refund on shower. Disgusting, nasty, unkept and rude employees. RUN, RUN, ‚Ä¶
